episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_01: Momo! When’d you get to Pasio?!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_02: Just recently! I came here hopin’ to surprise you!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_05: I’m relieved to see that you are both doing well.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_08:
At least, that’s what I’d be called if we were in
the Paldea region.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_09: But here on this island, I simply go by Clavell.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_10:
I intend to enjoy my time on Pasio as a sync
pair with my partner Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4001_1001_11:
I hope you two enjoy your time here and find your
own wonderful treasure.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1031_01:
In order to understand
youth culture...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1001_01: What is popular among the youth these days?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1001_02: Hmm. Stuff like social media, I guess?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1001_03:
You post stuff about yourself and interact with
others online.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1001_04:
I see... Then I, too, shall note down my tasks and
activity reports on social media.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/6801_1001_05: Then that’d just be a daily report...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_01:
The director must’ve come to check in on us
’cause he was worried about us.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_02:
Yeah. I was just shocked ’cause he appeared out
of nowhere.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_03:
Back in Paldea, he put a lot of effort into getting
Team Star back in school.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_04: So I think he genuinely wants to help his students.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_07: What are you up to? Is that your friend?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_08: Wh-whoa! Don’t startle me like that!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_09: Uh, is he a new friend of yours?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_11: (Then I gotta shout back to break the ice!)
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_13: COOL! I’M HUGH! NICE TO MEET YOU!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_14:
What’s up with you two?! Turn down the volume a
bit, will you?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_15:
Cool, cool! Sounds like you’ve been having more
fun on Pasio than I thought!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_16:
I wanna have a jam session with all the musicians
on Pasio, too!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_17: That sounds like a great idea—I’m all for it.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_19: I think I’ll liven things up first with a guerrilla gig!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4002_1001_20: OK! Let’s spin it up good, Kingambit!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_01: Huh? Weird... The sound’s not working.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_02: Um... Do you mind if I take a look at that?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_05:
I’m pretty good at tinkering with machines, so I
might be able to fix it...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_06: Really?! In that case, please do!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_08:
Wow, that was fast! Thanks for your help,
Sophocles!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_09:
I’m Giacomo, by the way! I came here
from Paldea.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_11:
Oh, um... Sorry...I’m not very good at talking to
people I just met...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_12: Huh. Reminds me of someone else I know...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_14: A little shy, good with machines...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_15: I have a friend just like that—her name’s Penny.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_17:
We upgraded a machine together at the Pokémon
Center before...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_18: Ah, so you two know each other!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4003_1001_19: Then that means you and I are friends, too!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_01:
Today, we’re here to speak to you all about the
peaceful use of sync stones!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_02:
Sync stones release more energy as the bond
between the Trainer and Pokémon deepens...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_03:
(A stone that brings out the potential between
humans and Pokémon...)
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_04: You seem to be listening quite intently.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_05: Are you interested in sync stones as well?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_06:
Indeed I am. I was involved in the field of
Pokémon research in the past, so I can’t help but
be curious.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_08:
My name is Clavell. I currently work in education
in the Paldea region.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_09: Apologies for the late introduction. I’m Maxie.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_10:
I’m the head of an organization called Team
Magma, but I, too, was a researcher before that.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_12:
I may have a different title now, but the curiosity
and hunger for knowledge I had as a researcher
have never waned.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_13:
I believe Pasio needs a place specifically for
facilitating useful talks like these...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_15:
I have also heard that many people on Pasio have
specific talents that are not limited to battles.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_16:
There is no better place for people to find their
treasure than here.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4004_1001_17:
Therefore, I was just thinking that Pasio ought to
have its own educational institution.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_01:
You should come check out my guerrilla gig,
Sophocles! It starts at—
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_02:
Hey! I told you to quit bothering us—we’re trying
to work here!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_03:
Why the cold shoulder, huh? We just wanna hang
out for a bit.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_04: Yo, we’re so bored! Entertain us!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_06: Um... Those are members of Team Skull...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_07:
There’s a custom in Alola called the island
challenge where Trainers take on trials.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_08:
Team Skull is made up of people who failed the
trials. Since then, they’ve been up to no good, as
you can see...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_11:
Hey, that’s enough. Can’t you tell they wanna be
left alone?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_12: Huh? What’s this numskull doing here?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_13:
Pestering others won’t change anything ’bout your
current situation.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_14:
If something’s bothering you, there’re other ways
to deal with it, don’t ya think?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_15: You gotta create change from within first!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_16:
What’s up with this dude and his logical
arguments? What a pain!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_17: If he wants to fight, I’m all in!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_19: Yo, I didn’t ask for your opinion!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4005_1001_23:
You ready for our session? Let’s get this party
staaarteeed!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_01: H-huh?! This guy’s no joke, yo!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_02:
I heard someone was making a commotion here.
Looks like you two lost pretty badly.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_05:
Makes sense. One of them is a captain from
Alola.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_06:
I dunno who the other one is, but if he’s trying to
mess with Team Skull...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_08: I’m not here to pick a fight.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_09: Just wanted to talk, you see.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_11:
My friends and I are part of a team, too, back at
my school. It’s called Team Star.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_12:
We were all really frustrated, and this one time,
we caused a lot of trouble ’cause of that. Ended
up having a ton of regrets about it.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_14:
Yeah, and I just didn’t want Team Skull to have
the same regrets... That’s all I wanted to say.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_15:
You like meddling in other people’s business,
don’t you?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_16:
Think my tone came off kinda annoying earlier
though... Sorry!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_17:
A silly little worry! Turned into a disaster, made
you wanna scurry!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_18:
Don’t like that you’re strong! Why don’t you just
run along!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_19: Hey, so there’s something I noticed...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_20:
Yo! Still got a problem with us?! I’m tired of all
the fuss!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_21: That, just now! You sound so cool!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_23: The way you rap! That’s talent right there!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_25:
These two have been insecure because no one has
acknowledged them.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_26:
They’ve been causing trouble with the Aether
Foundation members on Pasio...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_27:
And while it may not seem obvious given the way
they’ve been acting, it’s all because they want to
feel validated.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_28:
Well I’m tired of being pestered all the time,
you know?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_29:
Then how ’bout this? We’ll ask them to find their
own treasure that lets them shine. There, problem
solved!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_30: Hey! You two wanna put on a concert with me?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_34:
You went out of your way to meddle in their
business.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4006_1001_35:
You better take responsibility and follow through
with this.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_03: We’re just gettin’ started! I’ll spin it up good!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_04: Time to up the tempo! This show ain’t over yet!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_05: Yeah! I’ll pour even more of my soul into it!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_06:
Let’s keep this up all the way through our
last song.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_09: Momo looks like he’s having so much fun...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_10:
Indeed. Everyone on that stage is shining
wonderfully.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_11:
Apparently, Giacomo was the one who invited
the Team Skull members to perform.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_13:
He wanted to help them regain their confidence so
they could shine again.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_15:
(Those with knowledge and experience continue to
pass what they know along to others...)
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_19: May I speak with you for a minute, Giacomo?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_20:
Director? That’s a serious look on your face...
What’s up?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_21:
There is something I wanted to speak with
you about.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_22: I’ve had a vision ever since I arrived on Pasio...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_23:
and watching you today solidified my decision to
bring it to life.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_26:
is to establish a place of learning where we can
share high-level experiences and knowledge
on Pasio...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4007_1001_27: and I shall call it Pasio Academy!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_04:
Just as Giacomo paved the way for those Team
Skull members...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_05:
I believe we need an educational space where
everyone can bring forth their own knowledge and
experiences to share widely.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_06: And it’s not just about studying!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_08:
There was a time when Team Star refused to
attend classes. There were lots of reasons why,
but...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_09:
it was thanks to school that we were able to find
our treasure—our friends and passions.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_10:
If we could start a school on Pasio too, then a
new kind of bond that no one has ever seen
before could be born, right?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_13:
What are your thoughts? Could you please grant
us permission to found Pasio Academy?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_14:
I’d be very much obliged if you could help back
the project as well, if possible...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_15:
Heh, all right! Why not give it a shot? Sounds like
it could be interesting.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_17: The thing is, I have no clue how to run a school.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4008_1001_18:
I’m leaving it to you all to figure out the details.
You ready to do all that?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_01:
We have been granted permission to build an
academy, but this is where the real work begins.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_02:
I plan to look into what we need by referencing
Paldea’s academy.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_03: What can we do to help?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_04: I-I want you to make the school rules, Momo.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_06: You were the one who made Team Star’s code...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_08:
Are you concerned about the time you were
student council president?
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_10:
I might end up making some annoying school rules
again if I get involved...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_11:
And I’d ruin everything if everyone feels all stifled
’cause of that.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_12:
Giacomo, I believe the person you are today will
be able to handle it.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_13:
I am certain you’ll put the knowledge you’ve
gained from your experience as a part of
Team Star to good use.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_14: I would like for you to do it, too.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_17:
If it’s a school created by you, Giacomo, we
wouldn’t mind checking it out!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_18: So just give it your all, yo!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_20: All right, bring it on then! I’m ready to go all in.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_21: Seems like the crowd’s pretty well warmed up...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_22:
I’ll have everyone dancin’ to my tune in no time...
and this one’s NOT a tune for chillin’!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_23: Yeah! I know you can do it, Momo!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_24: I suppose we are about to get busy.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_25: We will need to design our uniforms...
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_26:
as well as find and recruit talented people to
teach and such.
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_27: We each gotta do our part and work hard at it!
episode_event_ch0327_ch0318/4009_1001_28: Yes—until the day Pasio Academy is established!
